Hello, all.
I have a question. As I am an independent researcher / investig=
ator / implementor and have no official academic affiliations, how would I =
go about publishing (and having it accepted!!!!) a paper involving NEAT?=C2=
=A0
This question has always plagued me in general. Any helpful suggestions=
 would be greatly appreciated.=C2=A0

Kind Regards,

Fred Mitchell,=C2=A0

=

+49 (0)15 259 409475, Skype: flajann
